control.name: seMaxItemCount
control.description: This spin editor allows the maximum number of items contained in the MRU editor to be specified.

control.name: ceShowCustomButtons
control.description: This check box shows or hides the 'Open file' button.

control.name: ceAllowAdding
control.windowcaption: Allow adding item to a mru list?
control.description: This check box allows or prohibits adding a new item to the MRU editor.

control.name: mruEditSample
control.description: Each time an end user clicks the 'Open file' button, the editor's ButtonClick event is raised. In this tutorial, the ButtonClick event is handled to invoke the 'Open' dialog. Once a file has been selected and the 'Open' button has been pressed, the name of the selected file is added to the MRU editor.

hint.name: mruEditSample
hint.hinttext: #KeyboardALT+DOWN, F4 to show or hide the dropdown listUP, DOWN keys to select the previous or next item#Mouse WheelSupported
